column5: Feb 15 (Reuters) â€“ Malaysia said on Saturday said an 83-year-old American passenger on a cruise ship that docked in Cambodia has tested positive for the new coronavirus.------The American woman took a flight to Malaysia on Friday from Cambodia
column6: the Malaysian health ministry said in a statement
column7: adding that her husband had tested negative.------The Westerdam
column8: operated by Carnival Corp unit Holland America Inc
column9: docked in the port of Sihanoukville
column10: Cambodia on Thursday after being shunned by several countries on fears that passengers could be carrying the virus. ------REUTERS------Press release in Malaysia
